content: 216 k4 sm k to m sm p1 sm k to m sm repeat step 1 k4 bind off 5 sts row 217 k4 sm yo k4 k2tog tbl p1 k3tog repeat steps 1-3 two times k11 k3tog tbl p1 repeat to last 6 sts before m repeat step 1 k2tog k4 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k4 k2tog tbl bind off 7 sts p1 k3tog k11 k3tog tbl repeat to last 7 sts before m p1 k2tog k4 yo sm k4 343 repeat steps 7-9 until last 7 sts before m row 218 k4 sm p6 k1 p13 k1 repeat to last 6 repeat steps 1-3 for 5 times sts before m p6 sm p1 sm p6 k1 p13 repeat repeat step 1 to last 7 sts before m k1 p6 sm k4 bind off row 219 k4 sm yo k2tog yo k1 x 2 yo k2tog tbl p1 k3tog yo k1 x 7 yo k3tog tbl weave in the ends and block to finished p1 repeat to last 6 sts before m k2tog yo k1 measurements x 2 yo k2tog tbl m1r sm k1 sm m1l k2tog yo k1 x 2 yo k2tog tbl p1 k3tog yo k1 x make tassels with the left over yarn 7 yo k3tog tbl repeat to last 7 sts p1 k2tog refer to the video link of tassel making technique yo k1 x 2 yo k2tog tbl yo sm k4 439 on page 2 row 220 note that there are no increases along the sides and the center on row 127 5 work row 9 26 of chart 1 for one time 6 work row 9 18 of chart 1 for one time 7 repeat steps 4 6 for one more time 8 work chart 2 for one time 9 work chart 3 for one time 10 work the picot bind off refer to page 5 for detailed instructions chart 1 main body pattern read rs row from right to left and ws row from left to
